title: How do I complete the "Who Will Win?" mission?
body:
As title says, sorry if I seem real dumb I have been playing for about two weeks now. I clicked the link in the mission (http://pickem.lolesports.com), dragged around the teams a bit, (I don't keep up with the LoL Pro Scene so it is random guesses), but I am not getting the reward.

I assume maybe I get the reward once the time remainder is up (1 day 18 hrs at posting this), but I don't want to risk losing easy exclusive stuff for my account.

Sorry for being dumb, any help is appreciated :)

replies.body: Restart your client, and you should see the mission update.  You might need to scroll down through your icons a bit to find it, though!
